Assamandala：1．Assamandala．-A ford on the Mahāvālukagangā in Ceylon （Cv．lxxii．27）．Geiger refers to a legend which connects this with Kacchakatittha，in which case it should be near the Mahāgantota，east of Polounaruva．Cv．Trs．ii．321，n．5．

2．Assamandala．-One of the spots included in the area marked off by Devānampiyatissa for the Sīmā of the Mahāvihāra．Mv．xv．15 in Appendix B to Geiger’s Edition．

3．Assamandala．-A village near Hallolagāma．Ras．ii．121．
